# File bug reports

If you've found a bug you can help out by filing a bug report on the [issue page](https://github.com/ohdsi/commondatamodel/issues) of the Common Data Model github. Try and be as specific as possible. What error message occurs? Can you provide a simple example as to why you are requesting a change to the model? 

# Join meetings

Please come to meetings and contribute to the discussion! All details can be found on our [home page](https://ohdsi.github.io/CommonDataModel/).
